thread.title: Stock Rally Fades Ahead of Fed Minutes, Inflation Data

author: Riva Gold
title: Stock Rally Fades Ahead of Fed Minutes, Inflation Data

organizations.name: stock rally fades ahead of fed minutes

text:
U.S. stock futures lower Fed minutes due Inflation figured eyed
A global stock rally petered out Wednesday, a day after Wall Street benchmarks posted their biggest gains in over two weeks, with many investors watching for an update on U.S. inflation and monetary policy.
The Stoxx Europe 600 edged down 0.3% in morning trading after two days...
